person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: But with the treaty , this kind of fact will be owned and subject to licensing , " said James Love , a consumer lobbyist heading the Washington-based Consumer Project on Technology .

Let's think step by step.

1. James Love
2. Consumer Project on Technology (an organization)
3. Washington-based (location)

So, the identified "Person" entities in the paragraph are:

1. James Love
2. (Implied) The Consumer Project on Technology (as James Love is identified as its heading)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
